body.name: SK hynix 1TB Portable SSD - Up to 1050MB/s, USB 3.2, Compatible with Windows, Mac, Android - External Solid State Drive
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 18 hrs 26 mins
features: BLAZING-FAST Data Speed: Supports a sequential read speed of up to 1,050MB/s equipped with DRAM

DRAM Acceleration: DRAM(Dynamic Random-Access Memory) technology to Supercharge Data Transfer Speeds. Enjoy Lightning-Fast Read & Write speeds, making file transfers, video editing, and data access smoother than ever.

COMPACT AND SLEEK DESIGN: Durable Aluminum Casing in Metallic Champagne Gold that protects your data from everyday bumps and bruises. Its sleek design makes it the perfect companion for your laptop or tablet, effortlessly fitting into your pocket or bag.
VERSATILE CONNECTIVITY for EVERY DEVICE: Compatible with Desktops, Laptops, Mac, Android, Tablets and Gaming consoles
CONNECT with EASE: TWO types of CABLES are included for Multi-Device Compatibility(C-to-C and C-to-A)
ACCIDENT-PROOF: Up to 2-meter drop protection and a provided case is an additional barrier of defense against dust and dirt.
3-YEAR Protection: SK hynix confidently stands behind the quality of our products

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Protective Case The Beetle X31’s clear silicone case provides an additional barrier of defense against drops, dust, and dirt. Simple Data Migration We provide our customized SK Hynix edition Macrium cloning software for data transfers and OS migration. Along with our Easy Kit software, so you can check the performance and status of your SSD at a glance. 3-Year Protection SK Hynix confidently stands behind the quality of our products, and a 3-year protection offer our customers even more peace of mind. Speed Powered by DRAM The Beetle X31’s impressive transfer speeds are the result of DRAM (Dynamic Random-Access Memory). Which reduces transfer time for increased productivity.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tiny, Lightweight, Easy to use.
reviews.reviewText: Includes: • 1 x SK Hynix Beetle X31 1TB • 2 x cable options: ◦ USB Type A -> USB Type C ◦ USB Type C-> USB Type C • 1 x Protective case Unlike other brands, SK Hynix Beetle comes with 2 cable options (USB Type A -> USB Type C & USB Type C-> USB Type C).Whichever your computer needs, you can pick and choose based on your computer spec.It is smaller than you think. Such a cute, sleek, pocket-sized external drive with protective case. Spec wise, it’s as described. High speed read/ write.

reviews.reviewText: Small enough for your pocket but enough space and fast copying speed

reviews.reviewText: Works as advertised.Fast speed all around as expected.The biggest plus is the aesthetic part of the product.It's super tiny and the size, shape, and the color of the product makes it feel premium.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No issues, just plug and play!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars But I never heard of them
reviews.reviewText: In this review I will leave it to others, many others, to argue things like speed. I don’t see the point – everyone’s going to get completely different real life speeds compared to those who glower over bench tests which seem to never exactly agree with each other anyway. My rule when considering any memory is to buy it, install it, try it and if it works for you keep it, if not try something else. In today’s world most memory devices are capable of near real-time speeds and the average user doesn’t need the maximum theoretical on-paper speeds for their everyday home computing, or even business needs. My focus is based more on two things – does the company who makes the memory device know what they are doing and is what they make reliable. Let’s start with the first, if you were to walk down any average street and ask a thousand people to name a brand of computer memory the chances that even one of them would name SK Hynix, yet this company is the second largest maker of memory in the world. Many of the most famous brands of electronic devices use this brand exclusively and have for many years. It is only recently that they have come out of their cocoon and started to sell under their own, albeit awkward, name.IS IT RELIABLEIf someone answers yes or no to that question, move on, they are giving you the wrong answer. No computer memory manufacturer sets out to make a memory device that purposely fails. Buying any brand, repeat that, any brand is a gamble. Sooner or later you will run into a product that messes up. Some will immediately suggest that the entire brand name is a bad choice. Again, move on. If I am playing the law of averages my choice would be to choose the biggest or second biggest manufacturer of memory devices in the world – I’m guessing they know what they are doing. Related to reliability is connectivity – many drives I own have loose ports which can result in lost data. The two included cables with this one are very substantial and lock in place with a satisfying click. I should say that this company’s entire presentation is first rate, with the minor exception of what I mention below.MAKING A DECISIONChoosing which one to buy, assuming we are talking about portable SSD’s now, really comes down to which one is on sale, which one looks prettiest and which one has the longest warranty. One the first score I chose this one on a whim, fully knowing who SSK Hynix is, because it was on a Black Friday sale and I bought it with my own money, and I liked the soft rounded corners because I actually did plan on using it as a mobile storage media and it feels good in my jeans pocket. The gold color was a plus to immediately make it identifiable in a drawer full of other devices. And I liked their choice of connectivity, which fit into every one of my devices without having to carry an adapter. And the 3 year warranty is definitely a big plus.SURPRISESMuch of the product page is written in Chinese, I’m surprised that they have never translated it for our domestic market. Although they mention it I was surprised that they include a thick silicone case which is clear so it doesn’t hide the beauty of the design. Unfortunately that beautiful design is only on one side of the product itself, the other side is bland silver and totally filled with written text. Another surprise is that although they say that they provide customized SK Hynix edition Macrium cloning software for data transfers and OS migration. Along with our Easy Kit software, so you can check the performance and status of your SSD at a glance. Neither of those apps is on the drive, in the box nor referred to in the brief instruction sheet. That is a disappointment and dropped them down a notch.YES NO MAYBEBased on my own criteria this was an easy decision and I like that it arrived without being loaded with bloatware. It seems rugged and it does not get unreasonably warm in use. And yes it is fast but everything I own is new generation. The everyday price is a bit high so if that were my only criterion I might have thought twice but I bet it goes on sale fairly often. Overall I am happy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Look good/ lightweight/ fast performance
reviews.reviewText: I love the compact and lightweight design. I have used several external drives; It works well with high speed. It allows me to transfer my data quickly and efficiently. Must buy.

reviews.reviewText: Tiny, powerful and super fast what more could I ask for!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice addition to my wife’s MacBook Timemachine backup
reviews.reviewText: Very nice, stylish fast external ssd drive.

El diseño es muy bonito, muy muy compacto.Yo formatee el SSD para funcionar con el Apple Fole System y lo encripté.Hice varias pruebas y sin problema llega a los 1000mb/s que promete.Justamente transferí 50GB de archivos en menos de 1 minuto.Muy muy recomendado para dispositivos Apple (Mac, iPad y iPhone)Ojalá sea duradero, pero de momento excelente y muy buen precio! (Pagué menos de $800 por 512GB)

La sua estrema compattezza, anche se non a fronte di una siluette particolarmente originale ed accattivante, permette di utilizzare questo HD SSD, al pari di una qualsiasi pendrive, della medesima capacità, con l'indubbio vantaggio, di velocità di trasferimento dati, anche di grandi dimensioni, in tempi decisamente estremamente ridotti.Se si considera poi, la dotazione di un guscio trasparente di protezione e di un doppio cavo di connessione usb c/usb c e usb / usb c, direi che c'è tutto sia per la protezione dell'SSD che per la sua connettività

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: BUY BUY BUYALL IN ONE:cables x 2speed is sick goodso far its been amazing.silicone protective shell is also includedno problem on mac win!for CDJs rekorbox etc...fantastic choice..price is great!

Der Portable Speicher ist spitze, ich habe mir die 1TB Variante geholt, kann es jedem empfehlen. Sehr gut verarbeitet, arbeitet zuverlässig und schnell, wird dabei auch nicht warm, verliert die Verbindung nicht. Alles dabei was man braucht. Top Produkt.
